message.content:
cs.NI, cs.RO, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.MA 

The paper deals with the coordination of mobile sensors in a network, which involves communication protocols, algorithms for sensor deployment, and management of failures. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves robotics (cs.RO) since it deals with the movement of sensors. Distributed, parallel, and cooperative computing (cs.DC) is also relevant since the paper deals with the coordination of multiple sensors. The paper also involves system and control theory (cs.SY) since it deals with the management of failures and conflicts. Finally, machine learning (cs.MA) may also be relevant since the paper involves algorithms for sensor deployment.
